reviewText: A major presentation that examines the spiritual roots of contemporary music. Seen by audiences around the world, ROCK AND ROLL -  A SEARCH FOR GOD focuses on some of the most significant questions faced by mankind today: Is there more to this existence than what I can perceive with my five senses? Is there a God? Can I know this God intellectually as well as spiritually? The presentation answers these questions while looking at the 20th Century-an exciting, informative, and often life-changing experience!
